exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce minusP to an evaluable reference.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Unable to unify "minusP (pO A n) ?M1947 (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) ?M1947)" with "minusP nil nil (minuspf nil nil)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: simpl. unfold minusP. intros l1 l2. destruct l1, l2. - apply mnillu1. - apply mnillu2. - apply mnillu1. - apply mmainu1. + unfold ltT. apply ltM_dec. + apply mnillu1.
